      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] deflate(String str)
      Deflates the given string and returns it as a byte array This method is consistent with inflate(byte[] buffer)
      static String inflate(byte[] bytes)
      Inflates the byte array assuming that is a string and returs it This method is consistent with deflate(String)
